column4: Hey guys, I recently downloaded the Flight 4, 5 and 6 CDs and all of them failed to start X.org. Any idea why? I have an ATI Radeon 9600 AGP card that works fine with 5.10.
Yes, that's what I did in first place and same problem: after the upgrade finished, I couldn't boot in graphic mode.
file a bug with errors from startx
you should try >> sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg << and choose VESA as the card type and leave the rest of the stuff the same
